TopicTitle: Orbital Asset Recovery (free space game with gravity)

Articles.Content:
"While attempting to recover a derelict ship, the emergency crew discover the ship has been infested with aliens feeding on the power supply. The crew must return power to the ship and set it on a course back home."
http://7dfps.com/?action=games&id=263

Walk on walls, cut down doors with your laser. Objects respect low gravity.
